name: anomaly_detector_bas
description: Trains anomaly detector with given input fields and performs 2 BAS over train and test

inputs.name: source_repair_flags
inputs.description: Source identifier of the repairs flag dataset

inputs.name: source_train
inputs.description: Source identifier for the training welds data

inputs.name: source_test
inputs.description: Source identifier for the test welds data

inputs.name: optimal_input_features
inputs.description: Optimal input features list as anomaly detection training features

inputs.name: original_input_features
inputs.description: Original input features list as anomaly detection training features

outputs.name: bas-datasets-output
outputs.description: Map containing references to the test BAS for optimal and original input features: "ds_test_optimal_BAS" and  "ds_test_original_BAS" respectively
